transcripts.text: This is why you have dug me the grave.  You have opened it down there, far away, to conceal me so as not to have problems and not have to see.  Fools!  You couldn't imagine that I would be resuscitated in this metal suit, that I would come back and stare at you with my dark face, without lips, You have to suck the heart of a hero as long as it beats.  You ought to know this.  I shook the country, made the arenas vibrate, tore my opponents to shreds.  I lit up the darkness, collected insults, compelled applause.  They used me for their entertainment, fed on shoddy stuff.
